path.style: font-size: 12px; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke-width: 0.625; stroke-linejoin: round;
font-size: 12px; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke-width: 0.625; stroke-linejoin: round;

rect.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(171, 70, 89); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 7; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;
opacity: 1; fill: rgb(42, 42, 138); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 7; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;
opacity: 1; fill: rgb(42, 42, 138); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 7; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;
opacity: 1; fill: rgb(108, 108, 210); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 7; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;

path.style: fill: none; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 5; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; marker-end: url(#Arrow2Mend); stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;

fill: none; fill-rule: evenodd; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 5; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; marker-end: url(#Arrow2Mend); stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-opacity: 1;

text.style: font-size: 40px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: bold; font-stretch: normal; text-align: start; line-height: 125%; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-opacity: 1; font-family: Bitstream Vera Sans;

font-size: 36px; font-style: oblique; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; font-stretch: normal; text-align: start; line-height: 125%; text-anchor: start; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-opacity: 1; font-family: Bitstream Vera Sans;
